desc: We specialise in luxury home fragrance products that are eco-conscious without sacrificing style. Hand poured in Tasmania, Australia, our 100% soy wax candles are made with the highest quality ingredients.   All our fragrances are phthalate-free, comply with the strictest global RIFM standards & are cruelty free.

layout.text: Hand poured in Tasmania, our luxurious pure soy candles are made with the highest quality ingredients, are cruelty free and eco-friendly.
